name: euor
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1)), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))

comment: Introduce a disjunct into a unique existential quantifier. For a version requiring disjoint variables, but fewer axioms, see ~ euorv . (Contributed by NM, 21-Oct-2005.)
